Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Provided mor comprehensive feedback when i would post the assignment and rubric into AI and get it to grade me. this gave me an idea of where i was at and tips to improve. Whereas a teacher would mainly just give me a graded mark and a coment such as well done

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: I felt a bit lost from teacher feedback and i wondered why i would get a comment of well done without full marks. I wouldnt know where i lost marks or why, unless i followed up

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: GenAI feedback is instant with some teachers taking a few days to not responding at all
